title: dhImnanA ta dhiranA (t)
sahitya:
dhImnanA ta dhiranA takiTataka dhImna nAta dhiranA dhiranA dhira dhIma nAta dhiranA dhiranA dhira


anupallavi

  dhImna tOmna dhImna tOmna kukundari kiTataka taka dhina tOm taka taka dhina tOm taka dhina tOm taka


caraNam    namkiTataka nomkiTataka takiTa dhimita dhimita takiTa kiTataka jhaNUtaka
dhittaLAngu taka tOm dhittaLAngu taka tOm dhittaLAngu taka
nava nava sundara vilasita shashimukha kavanAdi lalita kaLA paripUrNa 
shravaNAnanda kara muraLI vAdana vishArada nIrada nIla varNa
		(repeat the jati � namkiTataka .......)
